scripts.copybootstrap: mkdirp 'source/static' && cp ./node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js ./source/static && cp ./node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css ./source/static && cp ./node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js ./source/static && cp ./node_modules/tether/dist/js/tether.min.js ./source/static && cp ./node_modules/tether/dist/css/tether.min.css ./source/static
scripts.dev: npm run dev:init && parallelshell 'npm run css:watch' 'npm run svg:watch' 'npm run copy:watch' 'npm run webpack' 'npm run browserSync'
scripts.dev:init: mkdirp 'public' && npm run css && npm run svg && npm run copybootstrap && npm run copy
scripts.build: npm run build:init && npm run webpack:build && npm run rev
scripts.build:init: mkdirp 'public' && npm run clean && npm run svg && npm run css:build && npm run copybootstrap && npm run copy && npm run imagemin
scripts.prod: npm run build:init && npm run webpack:prod && npm run rev
scripts.postinstall: mkdirp 'public' && npm run clean && npm run dev:init && webpack --config ./tasks/webpack.js
